{"id":490077068,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1620403150,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/490077068/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"12.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int min(int a, int b){\n        if(a<b)return a;\n        return b;\n    }\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int n=word1.size();\n        int m=word2.size();\n        \n        vector<vector<int>> dist(n+1, vector<int>(m+1, 0));\n        for(int i=0; i<=n; i++){\n            // word1 -> i\n            \n            for(int j=0; j<=m; j++){\n                // word2 -> j\n                if(i==0 && j==0) continue;\n                if(i==0 ||j==0) {\n                    dist[i][j]=i+j; \n                    continue;\n                }\n                if(word1[i-1]==word2[j-1])  dist[i][j]=dist[i-1][j-1];\n                else{\n                    dist[i][j]=1+min(dist[i-1][j], dist[i][j-1]);\n                } \n            }\n        }\n        \n        return dist[n][m];\n        return 0;\n        \n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings"}
